bibl.title: Shrek v. Berry. Application for Writ
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

org.orgName: United States District Court For The Western District of Washington Northern Division

div1.p: In the District Court of Washington Territory and for the First Judicial District thereof holding Terms at Colfax in and for Whitman County said Territory,
In the Matter of the Application of Michael Schrek for a Writ of habeas corpus. }
Comes now L.P. Berry and for his answer in said writ of certiori to him directed and for his answer and return to said writ avers

1st. That he holds said Michael Shreck by vertue and by command of a certain committend is then directed issue our of etc Justice Court in and for Precinct No. 18. in and for Whitman County, Washington Territory, by William A. German Justice of the Peace a copy of which said Committment whereto attached Marked Exhibit "A" and made apart of this return.
2nd That in pursuance of said writ and in obedience be confined said Michael Shrek in the County jail
